cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV 

The paper proposes a method for tackling catastrophic forgetting in deep reinforcement learning, which is a problem in the field of machine learning. The proposed method involves a policy network interacting with a cascade of hidden networks, which is a technique commonly used in deep learning (cs.LG). The paper also involves the use of reinforcement learning (cs.AI) and control tasks (cs.RO), which are both subfields of machine learning. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of visual inputs (cs.CV) in some of the experiments. Finally, the paper does not seem to fit into any other specific sub-category, but the above categories are all relevant to the content of the paper.
